body.p:
Department of the Ohio,
Assistant Adjutant General's Office,
Lexington, Kentucky, January 29th, 1864.
Special Orders,
No. 30
[Extract.]

2,, The resignation of 2nd. Lieutenant John W. Evans Co. "H" 40th Ky. Mt'd vols for the good of the Service is hereby accepted, to take effect January 31st 1864, with the condition that he shall receive no final payment until he exhibits satisfactory evidence from the head of the Ordnance Department, and the proper accounting officers of the Treasury, that he has made all prescribed returns, and is in no wise indebted to the Government.

1. 2. 3. 4. 5
BY COMMAND OF MAJOR GENERAL FOSTER.
W P Anderson
Assistant Adjutant General.

40 Infy
Lexington, Ky
January 29th 1864
W P. Anderson
A. A. G.

The resignation of John W Evans Co "H" 40th Inf to take effect January 31st 1864
Recd at A. G. O. Feby 1st 1864
